conjecture: A polyhedral Lagrangian surface K in R^4 with exactly 4 faces meeting at every vertex necessarily has a Lagrangian smoothing, i.e., there exists a Hamiltonian isotopy K_t of smooth Lagrangian submanifolds parametrized by (0,1] extending to a topological isotopy on [0,1] with K_0 = K.
author: Mohammed Abouzaid
